text: Kenneth Allen Taylor (1954 â€“ December 2, 2019) was an American philosopher and radio personality. He was known for being the co-host (with John Perry) of the radio program Philosophy Talk. Taylor was born in Sandusky, Ohio. Taylor died on December 2, 2019 of a heart attack in Stanford, California at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American philosophers Category:American radio personalities Category:Writers from Ohio
title: Kenneth Allen Taylor
